projects.title: Machine Causation
projects.description: Developing an end-to-end causal discovery pipeline combining statistical methods with LLM-based reasoning to identify causal relationships through hypothesis generation and iterative validation.

projects.title: BBQS-CAMERA
projects.description: Developing a hardware/software framework of multimodal models for inference of anxiety state and memory efficiency from behavioral biomarkers.

projects.title: Enhanced Visual Awareness for Socially Cognizant Robot
projects.description: Developed a real-time multi-object tracking system integrating YOLOv8 detection, OC-SORT tracking and Kalman filters. Integrated enhanced visual awareness system into campus guide robot via ROS2 nodes.

projects.title: AI Agents for Smart Streetscapes
projects.description: Developing a naïve pipeline to infer accelerometer readings from video footage of people on a crosswalk. Assisting data collection and development of a cross-modal inference model.

projects.title: Visual Prompting for Depth Estimation
projects.description: Studied prompting techniques for computer vision, specifically for depth estimation. Developed training code and fine-tuned hyper-parameters for training a visual prompt on top of pre-trained models.

teaching.details: One-on-one coaching for students on academic planning, study strategies, time management, and navigating academic challenges
Workshops on metacognitive learning strategies, sustaining focus and motivation, effective time management, overcoming procrastination, and effective study practices
Back on Track Program (4-week support group for students facing academic challenges)
